wisharada edwad jayakodi yatathe sangithaya hadaru ohu githa gayanayata da dakshatha penwayi.roland nugepatha guruthuman yatathe yoga pilibanda praguna kota athi ohu nilan maligaspe yatathe bale narthanaya da upul gunawardhana yatathe anekuth narthanayan da hadara athi jenitas priyantha samarakon ge ‘muhudu dadayama’ keti chithrapataye da charitha nirupanaya kaleya.awurudu da, siriwasala, sathya, naththal kumari aadi teli natyawala rangamin punchi thirayata ek wu ohu pawuru bandi rajyaya, rassige awwa, romiyo juliyat, bhawa wireka aadi wedika natyayan sandaha da ranganayen dayaka wiya.

ee anuwa wasara pahakata pera alahabad wishwa widyalaye purana saha madhya kalina ithihasaya patamalawata athulu wuyemi.alahabad hi gewunu palamu wasara kisidu wishesha ho sandahan kalayuthu siddhiyakin thorawa gewi giya athara lankawen awashya pramanayatath wada mudal labunu bawin mata aarthika gataluwak da nowiya.mama adhyanaya katayuthu wala noyedunu kalhi ee asalinma galagiya ganga saha yamuna ganthera ibagathe awidimin, alahabad hi surupi indiya yuwathiyange ru sapuwa narambaamin sahallu saha kelilol jiwithayak gatha kalemi.

rusiyawe wiwidha kshetha්rawala sewaya karana wruththikayin, adhyapanaya labana sisun, wyaparika pa්rajawa athulu kshetha්ra kihipayaka shi්ra lankikayin mema awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha.mehidi adahas dakwu janadhipathithuma wadiduratath pa්rakasha kale thama rusiyanu sancharaya wathman rajaya jathyanthara washayen anugamanaya karana pa්rathipaththiwala thibena pahadilithawaya saha shakthimath bawa jathyanthara washayen thahawuru kala suwisheshi awasthawak bawayi.thaman saha thama rajaya batahirata pamanak barawu aanduwak bawata ada athamun wiwidha wiwechana ella karana athara ema siyalu wiwechana thama sama awasthawakadima pa්rathikshepa karana bawa pawasu janadhipathithuma madhyastha widesha pa්rathipaththiya thula lokaye sama rajyayakma ada shi්ra lankawe mitha්ra rajyayan bawata pathwa athi bawa da kiya sitiyeya.
